categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Unidentified female Imperial soldier  (Darth Marr's flagship)
A Human female served as a soldier in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic.

The soldier first appeared in the first chapter of Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire, a 2015 expansion to the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively-mulitplayer online game developed by BioWare. In the game, the soldier appears as a non-player character only identified as "Imperial Soldier".
